name: RAWS: a Raw Ascii Web Shooter
name_original: RAWS: a Raw Ascii Web Shooter
description:
RAWS: A web-based shooter made for the Gamedev.js Jam'2022

Designed with ♥ using raw javascript, sounds and ascii graphics

Visit each day to play a different level

Play online at: https://fdadeau.github.io/GameDevJSJam2022/
